about_the_game:
This game is free, and free players can experience almost all the features of this game.

This is a poker game with a "sufficient level" playing method.

Normally, the level up game starts with six players, divided into two factions. People from both factions alternate and sit in a circular formation.

Players need to cooperate with people from the same camp, limit their opponent's performance, and play all their cards as soon as possible.

The vast majority of faction based poker games calculate scores based on the victory or defeat of the group. We have created a unique "Qi Xia Poker Rank Evaluation System",

Accurately calculating the performance of players in the game allows them to achieve high scores even if they are matched with players with poor skills, resulting in a defeat for their faction.

The 'Master League' aims to match players with similar skill levels, without interfering with player win rates like some games that make all players have a win rate close to 50%.

"Challenge AI "provides an environment for players to engage in battles with AI, which is not limited by time and allows players to enjoy the gaming process comfortably.

The 'tutorial mode' provides teaching levels to help players who are not familiar with the 'sufficient level' gradually understand the playing method

"Friend Battle "provides players with the function of playing together with friends, allowing six friends to compete together, or 2-3 friends to team up to challenge AI or match master leagues.

Players can chat and have fun with other players in the game, and can also prohibit chatting to prevent cheating.

Paid props are usually used to enhance players' gaming experience, such as specialized emoticons, specialized playing cards, auxiliary card counting tools, etc

At present, this game is in the development stage: you can learn about our development progress through the social media links we have published.

We also warmly welcome your attention, suggestions, criticism, and guidance.
